taskOptions.description: A semicolon or comma separated list of other filters to add to the DataSet
taskOptions.name: Filters to add to the DataSet

taskOptions.description: If greater than 1, a filter will be applied to the input dataset to reduce the number of reads by this factor.  For example, a downsampling factor of 10 means that only one tenth of the reads will be used.  This is mostly intended for internal use and debugging.
taskOptions.name: Downsampling Factor

taskOptions.description: Sample name for all read groups. Defaults, in order of precedence: SM field in input read group, biosample name, well sample name, "UnnamedSample".
taskOptions.name: Biological Sample Name

taskOptions.description: Minimum mapped read length in basepair.
taskOptions.name: Minimum Mapped Length (bp)

taskOptions.description: Process High-Quality region of each ZMW, subreadset.xml input required (activates UNROLLED preset).
taskOptions.name: Process High-Quality Regions

taskOptions.description: Process ZMW Reads, subreadset.xml input required (activates UNROLLED preset).
taskOptions.name: Process ZMW Reads
